> I hope no one will be offended by my question since this is a Java
> list, but I am curious if anyone heard of a free or commercial
> equivalent to HttpUnit written for .NET.

Rather than rewrite every last line of Java for dotNET, why not try
IKVM.NET to run the Java code directly?

http://radio.weblogs.com/0109845/

IKVM is one of the best hopes going forward of preventing two code
bases for every open source project, but you could also try
J#. Gasp. Cough. Or even XML-RPC or SOAP. Hack. Urp.

-Patrick
